effect_entries.effect: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during strong sunlight.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.

effect_entries.effect: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.

effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
